game.name: Hyper Space
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Remote Play TV, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hyper Space is a “Dodge ’Em Up” Arcade game. Collect stars while avoiding space hazards to reach the highest score, unlock new skins, compete with your friends and travel through space to the most distant galaxies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hyper Space is a “Dodge ’Em Up” Arcade game. Collect stars while avoiding space hazards to reach the highest score, unlock new skins, compete with your friends and travel through space to the most distant galaxies.
